activities: Flex Discovery Solutions  is a leading discovery management services and solutions provider that delivers comprehensive electronic and paper discovery services for corporations and law firms facing litigation, regulatory and compliance matters. From time to time, client engagements may require us to collect, process or host data from the EU / EEA / or Switzerland, some of which may contain Personal Information subject to the Safe Harbor Principles.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Flex Discovery processes client data that may include various materials related to a client legal matter.  The data does not include manually processed data
recoursemech: Flex Discovery is committed to cooperate with data protection authorities (DPAs) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
